hypothesis_content.title: Diversification Narrative Timing - Rotation from BTC to Mid-Caps
hypothesis_content.statement: When 'diversification' narrative appears in major news headlines during NEUTRAL regimes, mid-cap crypto index (rank 20-100) outperforms BTC by 8-12% over next 10 trading days as capital rotates.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Current news shows 'market is starting to diversify its digital asset bets' - this narrative triggers institutional and large retail rotation from BTC to alts. The timing edge comes from entering as narrative gains momentum but before full rotation completes.
entry_conditions: Major news outlet publishes 'diversification' narrative article (sentiment score > 0.8)
BTC dominance (BTC.D) > 52% at time of article
Mid-cap index (crypto rank 20-100) 5-day performance < BTC performance
Volume in top 5 mid-caps increases > 40% day-over-day

exit_conditions.take_profit: Mid-cap index outperforms BTC by 10% OR 10 trading days elapsed
exit_conditions.stop_loss: BTC dominance increases > 2% from entry level

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If diversification narrative fails to trigger capital rotation (mid-cap underperformance continues)
